ISSUE.TITLE: Merging object does not allow to set a property value to null
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Describe the bug I created a custom part: ``` public class TestContentPart : ContentPart { public int? Minutes { get; set; } } ``` Using a driver I have set the `Minutes` value to a number like `10`. Everything works as expected. However, if I want to set it back to `null` after it was set to `10` the value will not allow setting null. because of this setting https://github.com/OrchardCMS/OrchardCore/blob/3fe9612adb08b03114177a485ecc02e52091030c/src/OrchardCore/OrchardCore.Abstractions/Json/JOptions.cs#L23 ### Orchard Core version main ### To Reproduce Steps to reproduce the behavior: Using the following test ``` [Fact] public void Apply_WhenCalledWithNullProperty_SetThePropertyToNull() { var contentItem = new ContentItem(); contentItem.Apply(new TestContentPart() { Minutes = -15, }); var instance = contentItem.As<TestContentPart>(); Assert.NotNull(instance); Assert.Equal(-15, instance.Minutes); contentItem.Apply(new TestContentPart() { Minutes = null, }); var minutes = (int?)contentItem.Content.TestContentPart.Minutes; Assert.Null(minutes); } ```
